name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026 Festival Profile**

Pinkpop 2026 brings together a vibrant lineup of 32 artists, showcasing a diverse range of genres and styles. With a strong presence of alternative rock (8 artists), pop (7), and indie rock (6), the festival leans heavily into contemporary and alternative sounds while offering a sprinkling of niche genres like grunge, rave rock, and gothic rock. Notably, every artist has a Spotify presence, ensuring accessibility for fans to explore the lineup ahead of the event.

Representing a global stage, Pinkpop 2026 features acts from eight countries, with the United Kingdom, the United States, and the Netherlands leading the charge. While the majority of the artists are male (20), there is a notable female representation (8) and a smaller number of mixed-gender acts (4). However, diversity in terms of ethnicity is limited, with only one person of color among the performers.

The festival has received an average rating of 6.88 from all 32 rated artists, reflecting a generally positive reception. With 100% of the acts rated and linked on Spotify, attendees can expect a well-rounded musical experience. Pinkpop 2026 promises to be a celebration of global music talent while offering a platform for both established names and emerging artists to shine.
